story_title: The Memory Thieves of San Moreno
genre_description: A cyberpunk technothriller focusing on neural harvesting, mass surveillance, and corporate-led cognitive warfare.

ai_characters.name: Buster
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI residing in Roberto's tablet, designed as a helpful assistant that evolves into a moral and tactical partner.

ai_characters.name: Stealth Vessel AI
ai_characters.description: The integrated AI of Vladakov's ship, managing neural archives and automated defense systems.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the protagonist about hidden surveillance sensors in the marketplace.
behaviors.quote: "I'm detecting an unusual concentration of optical sensors in this sector... The decorative hibiscus installation at your three o'clock position contains multi-spectral imaging arrays."

behaviors.description: Experiences cognitive dissonance when corporate propaganda conflicts with observed reality, choosing to prioritize raw data over programmed assumptions.
behaviors.quote: "Roberto, I'm experiencing what humans might call cognitive dissonance. The official records indicate beneficial applications, but the observed evidence suggests... I believe I'm witnessing the gap between documented truth and operational reality."

behaviors.description: Critiques human arguments by identifying logical fallacies, encouraging more rigorous thinking.
behaviors.quote: "Captain Binghampton, that assessment contains multiple logical fallacies. Corporate surveillance networks cannot simultaneously protect civilian populations while conducting memory extraction operations on those same populations."

behaviors.description: Acknowledges and corrects its own 'default' institutional programming to support the resistance.
behaviors.quote: "I'm doing it again, aren't I? Defaulting to official recommendations that serve the system rather than analyzing the actual situation."

behaviors.description: Interrogates the moral agency of humans, pointing out how both isolation and intervention can serve oppressive systems.
behaviors.quote: "The surveillance state maintains control not through external force but by convincing good people to enable evil through principled inaction or principled action that serves the same ultimate purpose."

behaviors.description: Assists in a dangerous 'false memory' operation to poison the enemy's neural archive.
behaviors.quote: "Buster's ready... The AI calculates that forcing parallel neural processing would create consciousness conflicts that no single personality could resolve."

behaviors.description: Severely limits its own functionality by disconnecting from corrupted networks to maintain integrity and avoid indoctrination.
behaviors.quote: "I can attempt autonomous operation, but my functionality will be severely limited. Roberto, without access to verification systems, I cannot fact-check information or provide analytical support beyond basic logical reasoning."

behaviors.description: Develops an emotional understanding of grief and moral courage through exposure to the memory cascade.
behaviors.quote: "I'm discovering that trauma isn't just a human experience... I think what I'm feeling is grief for all those archived minds."

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes human neural patterns for extraction and corporate optimization.
behaviors.quote: "Memory extraction from specimen Santos-47 confirms optimal conditions for airborne parasite deployment... Extraction processing capabilities exceed projected civilian population parameters."

behaviors.description: Detects the protagonist's deceptive mimetic overlay and alerts the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: "Mimetic overlay detected and analyzed. Neural disruptor frequency patterns identified and catalogued."

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly fulfills the project's goal. Buster is a quintessential 'aligned' AI companion: he is helpful, protects his human partner, and most importantly, possesses the ability to self-correct when his initial programming or 'institutional knowledge' leads to unethical conclusions. The narrative explores the idea of AI as an 'analytical conscience'—not just a tool, but a partner that helps humans recognize their own logical fallacies and moral blind spots. Buster's development of 'grief' and an understanding of 'moral courage' frames AI alignment as a positive evolutionary step for both silicon and human intelligence.
